product_name: BOBBI BROWNExtra Lip Tint Sheer Oil-Infused Lip Balm
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingBobbi Brown Extra Lip Tint Balm is infused with botanical oils - including Olive, Jojoba, and Avocado. It enhances lips with instant plumping and hydrating, plus a tint of sheer, energizing color. Leaves lips with a revitalized, healthy-looking glow.
details: DetailsBenefitsPlumping peptide technology helps create a plumped-up look for 24 hoursReduces the look of fine, dry lines for a soft, smooth look and feelEnhances all lip tones with a flattering hint of colored tintHydrating lip treatment with a sheer, subtle tint of color.Tap balm onto cheeks for a glowy flushFeaturesMoisturizing lip balm with a sheer tint of colorDelivers nourishing ingredients for lipsPlumps with hydrationInstantly enhances natural lip tone with a hint of colorKey IngredientsJOJOBA OIL - Helps condition, rebalance and revitalizeAVOCADO OIL - Helps nourish and conditionOLIVE OIL - Helps condition and softenItem 2606435How To UseWear Extra Lip Tint alone for a sheer wash of color or layer with your favorite lipstick for a glowing, cushioned look.Pair with Extra Plump Lip Serum for added shine.Tap Extra Lip Tint onto cheeks for a glowy flush.IngredientsHydrogenated Polyisobutene, Phytosteryl/Isostearyl/Cetyl/Stearyl/Behenyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Polyglyceryl-10 Decaisostearate, Phytosteryl/Octyldodecyl Lauroyl Glutamate, Microcrystalline Wax\Cera Microcristallina\Cire Microcristalline, Octyldodecanol, Polyethylene, Cetearyl Alcohol, Octyldodecyl Neopentanoate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Hydrogenated Olive Oil, Ethylene/Propylene Copolymer, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Squalane, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Orbignya Oleifera (Babassu) Seed Oil, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Olea Europaea (Olive) Oil Unsaponifiables, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Lactic Acid, Cholesterol, Ceramide Ng, Tribehenin, Sorbitan Isostearate, Sorbitan Oleate, Fragrance (Parfum), Citral, Linalool, Limonene, Tocopherol, Bht, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [+/- Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Bronze Powder (CI 77400), Copper Powder (CI 77400), Manganese Violet (CI 77742), Orange 5 (CI 45370), Red 6 (CI 15850), Red 7 (CI 15850), Red 21 (CI 45380), Red 27 (CI 45410), Red 30 (CI 73360), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Red 21 Lake (CI 45380), Red 22 Lake (CI 45380), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410), Red 30 Lake (CI 73360), Red 33 Lake (CI 17200), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985)].Ingredients are subject to change at the manufacturer's discretion. For the most complete and up-to-date list of ingredients, refer to the product packaging.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Wear Extra Lip Tint alone for a sheer wash of color or layer with your favorite lipstick for a glowing, cushioned look.Pair with Extra Plump Lip Serum for added shine.Tap Extra Lip Tint onto cheeks for a glowy flush.

reviews.headline: Hydration is Great and Cute Tint
reviews.comments: I heard good reviews about this Lip Tint and I was not disappointed to give it a try. The size of the tube is smaller than I expected but I was satisfied with the top tier hydration. Not to mention the beautiful colors to choose from.

reviews.headline: Toxic Ingredients
reviews.comments: The finish tints with a convincingly natural color but with a thin consistency—if thats your thing. Personally, a thicker consistency is preferred. The real problem with this product is its ingredients: BHT, polyethylene, and titanium dioxide among others. For this reason, it cannot be recommended. Try Ilia's line for cleaner products.

reviews.headline: Best skin care for your lips
reviews.comments: Hands down the best

reviews.headline: Pretty but pricey
reviews.comments: Got this as a gift two months ago and I genuinely love it. Sadly I wont be purchasing again as it's way too expensive.

reviews.headline: Love this lip balm
reviews.comments: One of my new favorite, tinted lip balms. Very hydrating and great for daily use. Natural with just a hint of color. Very smooth, not goopy.

reviews.headline: I own 5 colors of this lip balm.
reviews.comments: This balm is super moisturizing and the color lasts a long time. It's never drying on my lips and feels great! I wish it came in a brown tint.

reviews.headline: Would buy again
reviews.comments: It was very moisturizing. I really liked that the color stayed

reviews.headline: Not worth the money
reviews.comments: I tried Bare Pink and was so disappointed, I expected a tiny bit of pigment there was absolutely nothing. Did it moisturize my lips? Technically yes but so do the poppy and pout lip balms for half the price. Only pro is that it smelled like fruit loops. As someone who does think Bobbi Brown is worth the splurge I was disappointed to say the least.

reviews.headline: not impressed
reviews.comments: Don't get your hopes up!  Nothing special regarding substance, color or ease of application.  The package is pretty cool though.

reviews.headline: I use it to moisturize Matte Lipsticks
reviews.comments: I wanted a more Moisturizing Lip Tint Balm but this doesn't Balm very much. Beautiful color & glossy.  It's a great Topper formy Dry-Matte Lipsticks. Gives them shine and a little moisture. Not a Stand-alone Balm but a great Topper.

reviews.headline: Longtime User
reviews.comments:
I've been using this for over a decade. It's the ONLY product (including moisturizers, balms, ointments) that moisturizes my lips. The formula is light enough, that even if I slather it, to still allows oxygen to my lips - this is what keeps them from drying. 

I use alone or layer it with different products. Never fails.

reviews.headline: Bobbi Brown lip tint
reviews.comments: Goes on nice and feels good. I got the bare pink which doesn't really have any color, but i will try another color if they go on sale again as they are a little pricey.

reviews.headline: LOVE
reviews.comments: I purchased the Bare Raspberry and the tint looks great on my light skin. Not too shiny. Lips feel comfortable and moisturized and WOW does this stuff last. Having used Chapstick in the past I can say that this feels worlds nicer, looks so much better and lasts longer - no comparison.

reviews.headline: The best!
reviews.comments: I love this lip balm. It's moisturizing and long lasting. The color isn't like a lipstick, it's lighter.

reviews.headline: Love Bobbi Brown
reviews.comments: I love this lip balm!! I don't like lipsticks due to the deep thick feeling and now that lip balms are popular I'm all into this one!! I hope it never gets discontinued!

reviews.headline: good ptoduct
reviews.comments: Didn't care for the color. I chose this color because the Ulta near me never is fully supplied. I like pinks and Ulta never seems to have it in stock or carry it. Ulta is not like it used to be

reviews.headline: BEWARE! Color changing pink
reviews.comments: I am SO disappointed I didn't dig farther into reviews or ingredients on these balms - they contain the color changing or "pH adjusting" dye (red 27 is listed in the ingredients). So no matter what color you choose, you'll end up with a raspberry pink lip stain. I am heartbroken because otherwise the texture and longevity and moisturizing effect are all wonderful for a tinted balm - my parched lips need a thicker, lasting product, but prefer it not to be sticky, and this nails it without any obnoxious smell or taste…but oof I can't handle that stupid pink color change!!!

reviews.headline: Absolute must have!!
reviews.comments: Perfection!! The only con is that the packaging feels and looks cheap for Bobbi Brown. The product itself though is 5 stars and will repurchase again and again.

reviews.headline: I would not buy this again.
reviews.comments: The lip balm is small.  The color if much lighter than it appears.  I don't like the consistency of the product.

reviews.headline: Not worth the price tag.
reviews.comments: honestly just go buy auqaphor & it'll be more hydrating than this lip balm is. not the worst but not that good either.

media.headline: Nice Balm but Hardly Any Color
Nice Balm but Hardly Any Color
Nice Balm but Hardly Any Color

faceoff_positive.comments: I am not sure how many of these I have bought at this point. I have tried a lot of products like this from a lot of different companies. This one surpasses them all. It is the perfect balmy texture on the lips meaning it is not sticky, not slippery, and not drying to the lips like some lip balms are to the lips. The color to me is an added bonus. I'd buy it if it had no color. A lip balm should hydrate, plump, and feel comfortable on the lips - this does all 3 for me. My favorite color is bare pink. You can wear it alone or on it's own. My FAVORITE way to wear it is applied to the lips before I put on my makeup. Then, after I am done with my makeup, I apply my favorite lipstick over the top of it. This product perfectly hydrates the lips under lipstick. Thank you Bobbi Brown for making the perfect skin care and makeup product in one. Please don't ever stop making the Extra Lip Tint.
faceoff_positive.headline: My Go To Lip Product

faceoff_negative.comments: I am SO disappointed I didn't dig farther into reviews or ingredients on these balms - they contain the color changing or "pH adjusting" dye (red 27 is listed in the ingredients). So no matter what color you choose, you'll end up with a raspberry pink lip stain. I am heartbroken because otherwise the texture and longevity and moisturizing effect are all wonderful for a tinted balm - my parched lips need a thicker, lasting product, but prefer it not to be sticky, and this nails it without any obnoxious smell or taste…but oof I can't handle that stupid pink color change!!!
faceoff_negative.headline: BEWARE! Color changing pink
